Uses of Class
clay.Point

  • Uses of Point in clay

    Methods in clay with parameters of type Point 
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    static double Point.angle​(Point A, Point B)
    Define the angle with the x-axis of the vector defined by point AB
    static double Point.dist​(Point A, Point B)
    Define the distance in a 3D
    static double Point.distXY​(Point A, Point B)
    Define the distance in a 2D plane between points that could be in 3D
